ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - Alcohol Remade
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in several of the alcoholic beverages found in Morrowind, rebuilt and uploaded as a seperate mod. Most of the drinks are fermented using precursors, crafted from the raw materials of one of three new plants. Each drink has a unique effect, though if a pawn consumes too much then they will simply be left feeling drunk.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded
-Requires SYR Universal Fermenter for 1.1 or 1.2.
-Can be used with Vanilla Expanded Frameowrk, Universal Fermenter, or Processor Framework for 1.3.
-Includes a patch that adds wild versions of the three plants to the ashlands, if MorrowRim is enabled.
-Includes several patches to add raw wickwheat and raw saltrice to recipes from other mods.
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
